nodes.text: Confrontation on the Stenness Hyperspace Terminal

This confrontation occurred on the Stenness Hyperspace Terminal in 3999 BBY, when crime lord Bogga the Hutt sent a group of his enforcers to steal a package of Adegan crystals from Jedi Knight Andur Sunrider and his family. Sunrider was killed in the fight by enforcer Gudb's pet gorm-worm, Skritch, but his wife Nomi Sunrider took his lightsaber and fought the thugs off.
